Name: Maiden and Swordsman
About the game: The game has free DLC, press the key combination 'Win + R', enter: steam , press Enter, and you can download free DLC. (Win key is the second key in the lower left corner, the key of the four squares) The in-game settings are turned on sharply ( you need to turn it on manually ), you can get BUFF, it is easier to upgrade the monsters, and the NPC is more charming. There are special plots to complete the mission. After the customs clearance, the EXP training room is full of benefits. More exciting than a pool party! The latest version removed most of the lights, optimized loading, and post-processing effects. More content waiting for you to discover ~ In this quiet city, there are many adventurers summoned. Hang up, upgrade monsters, help friends, and finally defeat demons, defeat various demons and save the city. The difficulty of each world is different, from the lowest difficulty of Lv1 to the highest difficulty of Lv5, there are many demonic breath creatures. There are still many weird things in the city. What is it? Hurry into the game and explore the unsolved mysteries of the city! Defeat Lv5 Demon and save the world! Add the ability value to judge, you can enter the next world if it is higher than a certain value. You can do tasks, upgrade monsters, or hang up in the training room. Basic operations WSAD controls left and right, left mouse attack, 1 ~ 8 release skills, Space jump, I open the backpack, K opens the skills panel, C opens the properties panel, Q opens the task panel, H checks the key help, press R to switch weapons, press E to interact, M Zoom in and out on the small map, press Alt to release or lock the camera, F1 ~ F12 use action expressions. riding pet Added a few rideable animals to run fast Task There are many tasks in the game, as well as confusing tasks. Come and challenge it! Skills Will use advanced magic and summon magicians, and swordsmen with excellent swordsmanship. The skills are simple and easy to operate. The BUG has more BUG-level super skills. Injury-free clearance is not a dream! !! !! Equipment production Crafting Powerful Equipment Shop You can buy recovery medicines, drink and drink! Never fear death again! Having DLC and turning on the heat can increase the ability value, and can perform special interactions after completing the task. Monsters are not strong, but eating indiscriminately will reduce the ability value , or even a negative number, so that they cannot hunt.
